entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain mixed with snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or snow ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 4:03 PM MST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero.
